channel.title: Advertising
channel.description:
It seems that an immense amount of you seem to think it is alright to advertise both your servers and forums in your server download topics. This is unacceptable, and will not be tolerated. If you are caught doing it, you will be [b]punished severely, no questions asked[/b]. You are all aware that this should not happen, and it's going to stop right now.
Please also take into account that this does not only go for the downloads section, but for the [b]whole[/b] site. The only exception for this is the RSC section, which [b]Server[/b] advertisements will be acceptable for RSC servers.
I've been receiving personal messages asking if this rules goes for signatures as well, it [b]does not[/b].

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It seems that an immense amount of you seem to think it is alright to advertise both your servers and forums in your server download topics. This is unacceptable, and will not be tolerated. If you are caught doing it, you will be punished severely, no questions asked. You are all aware that this should not happen, and it’s going to stop right now.

Please also take into account that this does not only go for the downloads section, but for the whole site. The only exception for this is the RSC section, which Server advertisements will be acceptable for RSC servers.

I’ve been receiving personal messages asking if this rules goes for signatures as well, it does not.

Read full topic
